Ok, I downloaded this game, extracted and opened POP2.exe and it asked to run the game in safe mode or no, i pressed yes then a black screen and nothing happens, then i try to run it in no safe mode and the same thing happens, i tried to download other cracked .exe for this game but it says to open prince of persia.exe to play, but i cant open that .exe because it gives an error that it is not a valid win32 application. I had this game on my PC long ago and it worked perfectly so my system isn't the problem of not launching the game!

hmmm... i've finished the game long ago already. Apart from one bad glitch it run smoothly. To avoid serious glitches, as you exit sand portals chaging into present/past, dont reenter them. Keep as many saves as possible and you should be fine. The skeleton means he's a trusted uploader, so basically what he puts up is good. As I said ealrier, on my system wuth windows 7 it runs greatly. Extract with winrar or 7zip , maybe make a shortcut of the POP2.exe on your desktop, anyway run it it should work. perhaps the black screen u see is that it doesnt play the opening ... try pressing esc,space anything. You can also try adjusting the games Windows compatibility at right click/ properties & switch it to win XP
